templateId.description: The unique identifier for the template.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the template was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the template was last updated.

creatorUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the template.

messageTypeId.description: The type of message associated with the template.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with the template.

clientTemplateId.description: The identifier specific to the client for the template.
